mapper.sql: SELECT itemno,userno,itemname,createdate+ INTERVAL '9' HOUR AS createdate,price,itemcomm,remain,titleImg FROM ITEM
mapper.insert:
SELECT item_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO ITEM(itemNo, userNo, itemName,itemComm,price,remain) VALUES(#{itemNo},#{userNo},#{itemName},#{itemComm},#{price},#{remain})

SELECT itemfile_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT into itemfile(fileNo,itemNo,originName,storedName) VALUES(#{fileNo},#{itemNo},#{originName},#{storedName}})
